dmca.title: Blogger DMCA Complaint- John Wiley
dmca.body:
111 River Street, 3-05

Patrick M. Murphy

February 28, 2007 
Google. Inc.
Attn: Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints 
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway 
Mountain View, CA 94043 
VIA FAX: (650) 963-3255
 
Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints: 

I, the undersigned, CERTIFY UNDER PENALTY OF PERJURY that I am an agent authorized to act on behalf of the owner of certain intellectual property rights, said owner being named John Wiley & Sons, Inc, a global publisher of books, journals, and other products, or one of its related companies ("Wiley").

We recently learned that an unauthorized copy of the material listed below is available for download on a website hosted by your company at the following URL address: http://ebooksdigest.blogspot.com/2007/02/collections-28-ajax-ebooks.html. The material is as follows:

1. Professional Ajax, (ISBN 0-471-77778-1) by Nicholas Zakas 
2. Beginning Ajax with ASP.NET (ISBN 0-471-78544-X) by Wallace McClure 
3. Ajax For Dummies, (ISBN 0-471-78597-0) by Steve Holzner
 
I have a good faith belief that the use of the titles identified above are not authorized by Wiley, its agent, or the law and therefore constitute a serious infringement of, inter alia, Wiley
